item.title: Weekly Music Recommendations [1] 11/15/19
item.dc:creator: ragyuo
item.description:
恥見まして、私わらギュおです！ Nice to meet you! I’m Ragyuo! And welcome to the first segment  of Vocaloid songs weekly where I recommend and showcase either new producers, new songs, or old songs that you’ve probably never heard of but needed recognition that is a BOP!! Each and every Friday I will show everyone 5 songs that you’ve …

The post Weekly Music Recommendations [1] 11/15/19 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
恥見まして、私わらギュおです！
Nice to meet you! I’m Ragyuo!

And welcome to the first segment  of Vocaloid songs weekly where I recommend and showcase either new producers, new songs, or old songs that you’ve probably never heard of but needed recognition that is a BOP!! Each and every Friday I will show everyone 5 songs that you’ve probably never heard of!

Today, I want to showcase some new producers and an old song you’ve probably haven’t heard of. Starting with the first one!


r-906 – Monochrome Sense / モノクロセンス / Vocaloid: Hatsune Miku



r-906 is relatively new and the first moment I heard this song it was an immediate bop!! It was hard to find the name of the song in English so I had to translate it. Lucky me, I can read hiragana!

He has more songs I really like! I suggest you check this person out!

Hachiya Nanashi – Jitter bug / vocaloid: Hatsune Miku, Meiko



If you have heard of “one off mind” this is another of his. I was confused if I could call this one van de shop or bee shop since he made “one off mind” with van de shop. But this song is a definite banger!! This song includes Miku and Meiko diets which there shall be MORE of but this is perfectly awesome!!

Check out more of their songs!!

Misumi – Dorothy / Vocaloid: flower



When I first heard this song I immediately put it on loop!! You gotta listen to more of Misumi they are awesome!! Misumi also has songs like alter ego that I really love!! You have to check it out!!

Rokuro/ろくろ – Slow downer / vocaloid: Gumi, Hatsune Miku



This is one of his popular songs that I don’t hear people talk about, this song was around the Vocaloid community even when it came out but this song is a straight up bop!!

You also have to check out his other songs. One of his songs was used as the ending song for one of the Nico Nico chokai concerts.

KagomeP – Immortal Taste of the Bloody Travel   / Vocaloid: Kagamine rin




THIS SONG IS LIT!! I discovered this song when CircusP made a cover of this using zunko. This song deserves more recognition because it got me shaking when I first heard this song.

If you don’t know KagomeP, his first song is the song you see on almost every spooky Halloween Vocaloid song list, which is Kagome, Kagome (Circle, circle). Despite the grotesque theme, this song is a head banger!!


That’s it guys!! Join me next week for 5 new songs/producers!! And remember to check their other songs out!!

The post Weekly Music Recommendations [1] 11/15/19 appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Miku Expo 2020 Europe Dates, Locations & Official Artwork Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
It is finally time! For our European Hatsune Miku fans’s enjoyment, Miku Expo 2020 Europe‘s dates and locations got finally revealed! Let’s check it out! A new European Tour! Not much time has been passed ever since Miku stepped in Europe for the first time, and it appears her supporters from said continent will be …

The post Miku Expo 2020 Europe Dates, Locations & Official Artwork Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It is finally time! For our European Hatsune Miku fans’s enjoyment, Miku Expo 2020 Europe‘s dates and locations got finally revealed! Let’s check it out!

A new European Tour!

Not much time has been passed ever since Miku stepped in Europe for the first time, and it appears her supporters from said continent will be very happy to know that she’s going to London, Paris, Berlin, Amsterdam and Barcelona this time around!

Main visual for #MIKUEXPO2020 EUROPE has been released!!
Check out beautiful and cool Miku by POKImari #MIKUEXPO5th pic.twitter.com/uvPZhcui45

— MIKU EXPO 2019 (@mikuexpo) September 17, 2019

This marvelous official artwork had been drawn by POKImari for the event, and it represents marvelously the locations we got this time! Below you can find the complete list of each date and location!

  • LONDON – January 11th – O2 Academy Brixton
    Buy your ticket here!
  • PARIS – January 16th – Le Zénith Paris
    Buy your ticket here!
  • BERLIN – January 20th – Verti Music Hall
    Buy your ticket here!
  • AMSTERDAM – January 24th – Ziggo Dome
    Buy your ticket here!
  • BARCELONA – January 28th – Sant Jordi Club
    Buy your ticket here!

Prices range between 56,50 EUR for the standard ticket and 170 EUR for the VIP Package

Ticket pre-sales will start on September 27th, and seems they will hold an anniversary song contest too, accepting every language possible!

Along with this tour we are planning a #MIKUEXPO5th Anniversary Song Contest!! Details will be announced on Sept. 27th when the ticket sales start. This time we will be accepting songs featuring Miku in any language!

— MIKU EXPO 2019 (@mikuexpo) September 17, 2019

More Information

Stay tuned for more details, and don’t forget to follow VNN for updates!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo
Don’t forget to also check out Miku Expo’s official website and Twitter!

The post Miku Expo 2020 Europe Dates, Locations & Official Artwork Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Collaboration Store Announced For Atre Akihabara
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
With the passing of Miku Day on March 9th, we’re now a step closer to Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary! The official Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary site has received a new update detailing a collaboration store to be held at Atre Akihabara in Akihabara on April 22nd~May 7th. Limited goods, collaboration goods, and wall wrappings have …

The post Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Collaboration Store Announced For Atre Akihabara appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the passing of Miku Day on March 9th, we’re now a step closer to Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary! The official Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary site has received a new update detailing a collaboration store to be held at Atre Akihabara in Akihabara on April 22nd~May 7th.

Limited goods, collaboration goods, and wall wrappings have been announced for the collaboration, while further plans will follow at later dates. If you’re planning a visit to Japan, be sure to visit the collaboration store at the second floor event space at Atre Akihabara 1 building!

> Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Site

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Collaboration Store Announced For Atre Akihabara appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Luo Tianyi Concert with All 6 Vsinger Characters to Make an Appearance and More!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
On December 4th, a live stream was held by Vsinger, and not only did we see the cute Luo Tianyi merchandise but also we heard a sample of Yuezheng Longya. Everyone is eagerly looking forward to the first male Chinese VOCALOID to release and want more information. Vsinger made a Weibo post suggesting that even bigger …

The post Luo Tianyi Concert with All 6 Vsinger Characters to Make an Appearance and More! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On December 4th, a live stream was held by Vsinger, and not only did we see the cute Luo Tianyi merchandise but also we heard a sample of Yuezheng Longya. Everyone is eagerly looking forward to the first male Chinese VOCALOID to release and want more information. Vsinger made a Weibo post suggesting that even bigger news was coming, and people assumed it was concerning a concert.

Our Chinese VNN team was invited by TianShi HeNian to attend the press conference themed “穿越星河的旋律” (Melody Across Galaxy) on December 8th at the Shanghai Center. The press conference started at 2:30 PM and the event was live-streamed on Bilibili as well. Vsinger not only gave more information about Yuezheng Longya but also, for the first time, gave us a confirmation about Vsinger’s live concert. HeNian had also announced that they will work closely with TaiHe Media, hoping the collaboration will bring a better future for the Chinese VOCALOIDs.

A Stunning Performance and Vsinger’s Character Models Make a Debut

Vsinger already hinted that all of their characters would make a debut at the conference. When VNN arrived, we immediately noticed the huge poster on the wall featuring all of Vsinger’s character models! This was the first time that we saw the official models for Longya, Mo Qingxian, and Zhiyu Moke.

The conference began with a stage performance of Luo Tianyi performing the popular song “Sun Quan the Emperor.” The song following after was the famous “普通DISCO,” which had all of Vsinger’s characters performing on stage. The song originally sung by Luo Tianyi and YANHE also had Yuezheng Ling and Yuezheng Longya singing together this time. It definitely brought a surprise to many fans who were eager to see the Yuezheng siblings performing together, not to mention it being a high quality performance as well.

A Concert Was Announced to be Held in 2017 Featuring All of Vsinger’s Characters!

After the show, Vsinger announced that a concert will be held on June 17th, 2017, at the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai! Not only will Luo Tianyi be present but also YANHE, Mo Qinxian, Zhiyu Moke, Yuezheng Ling, and Yuezheng Longya as well! Ticket pre-sales will open on the 16th of this month, with a limit of 500SVIP tickets made available. It was also announced that in the future Shanghai Henian will collaborate with the Taihe Music Group.

Concert promotional video. Tianyi also expressed the expectations of the concert and hoped for the fans’ support.

Yamagata Ryuji will be the general director of the concert. He is also known as the director of the NICONICO Party and other large scale events. He was also involved in several important past performances featuring Tianyi such as BML, China’s 11th Golden Eagle Art Festival, and the TMNT 2 trailer. Mr. Yamagata mentioned that their team has a lot of experience with onstage performances and within the technical department. He promises to bring some new content to the concert, with an AR live stream concert for fans in the future.

Longya’s Voice Provider Hopes to Cooperate Even Further!

Following the live stream on December 4th, AJie was also a guest at this event. When asked about his experience voicing Longya, he said that he had contributed “every skill he had” to him, expressing many emotions and providing all kinds of voice types. As Vsinger made a Weibo earlier confirming that Longya will have more than one voice bank, now we definitely want to hear the final product of Yuezheng Longya. He mentioned that he is hoping to see Longya used in a variety of music and styles.

Before the end of the conference, a new song “追光使者” (Light Chaser) was played and it was composed by well-known musicians such as “林迈可” and “易家扬.” It was also made available for download on Netease’s music platform. You can go listen to this amazing song now!

The conference brought us plenty of great news such as a concert in 2017 as well as the production of Zhiyu Moke and Mo Qingxian. It was definitely a worthwhile trip! With new partners such as the Taihe Music Group and many others mentioned above, hopefully this will spark attention internationally. We look forward for next year to bring us plenty of great things!

Well will make sure to bring you any updates we have, so stay tuned!

 

Other News

Yuezheng Longya’s Demo Revealed and Luo Tianyi Merchandise Open for Pre-order

Luo Tianyi’s Performance at China’s 11th Golden Eagle Art Festival!

Luo Tianyi in The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 Movie Promo in China!

Luo Tianyi Will Be Performing at the Bilibili Macro Link!

Official Links

Vsinger’s Weibo

The post Luo Tianyi Concert with All 6 Vsinger Characters to Make an Appearance and More! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku x Kodo Taiko Performing Arts Ensemble Announced For March 4th~5th, 2017
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The first collaboration performance of Hatsune Miku and Kodo, Japan’s internationally famous taiko drumming group, has been announced! The performance is part of the “Tokyo Olympic official program”, spreading the charm of Japanese culture widely while also leads to the main events. The performance will be held on March 4th~5th, 2017 at NHK Hall. Ticket sales will be available …

The post Hatsune Miku x Kodo Taiko Performing Arts Ensemble Announced For March 4th~5th, 2017 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The first collaboration performance of Hatsune Miku and Kodo, Japan’s internationally famous taiko drumming group, has been announced! The performance is part of the “Tokyo Olympic official program”, spreading the charm of Japanese culture widely while also leads to the main events.

The performance will be held on March 4th~5th, 2017 at NHK Hall. Ticket sales will be available in Japan on December 13th (11:00 JST)~December 20th (11:00 JST) for lottery sales, with general sales to follow up starting from January 14th (10:00 JST).

> Official Kodo Taiko Performing Arts Ensemble website

> Official Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live website
> Official Hatsune Miku x Kodo Special Live Twitter

バーチャルシンガー初音ミクと世界中に和太鼓の魅力を伝える太鼓芸能集団・鼓童との初のコラボレーション公演が決定！17年3月4、5日にNHKホールにて開催。本公演は東京２０２０公認プログラムとして実施致します。今後の情報をお楽しみに！ https://t.co/XRnaoqxgES pic.twitter.com/PvvqU3obkQ

— 初音ミク×鼓童スペシャルライブ公式 (@kodo_miku) November 24, 2016

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Hatsune Miku x Kodo Taiko Performing Arts Ensemble Announced For March 4th~5th, 2017 appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Macne Nana Website Updated & Macne Nana V4 Design Illustration Uploaded!
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
Today, the website macne.net has been updated with a new image and statement saying that Macne Nana V4 will be released soon. The image is the design for Macne Nana V4 and Macne Nana Petite, illustrated by Akatsuki Gomoku. They also mentioned that Macne Nana V4’s software launching process is currently underway and will be announced …

The post Macne Nana Website Updated & Macne Nana V4 Design Illustration Uploaded! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Today, the website macne.net has been updated with a new image and statement saying that Macne Nana V4 will be released soon. The image is the design for Macne Nana V4 and Macne Nana Petite, illustrated by Akatsuki Gomoku. They also mentioned that Macne Nana V4’s software launching process is currently underway and will be announced soon.

As usual, we will deliver you another update as soon as the exact release date for Macne Nana V4 has been revealed. Stay tuned on VNN!

More Information

Macne Nana V4 Official Website (Japanese)

You can also check our previous articles about Macne Nana V4:

Macne Nana Teaser Launched

Second Card Revealed on Macne Teaser Website!

Final Macne Nana Teaser Website Card Revealed!

Macne Nana V4 Announced!

The post Macne Nana Website Updated & Macne Nana V4 Design Illustration Uploaded! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Lux Commercial Featuring Hatsune Miku & Scarlett Johansson Now Online
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The full commercial from Lux’s previous teaser announcement is now online! In this video, we finally get to hear the entirety of Mitchie M‘s song, Future Overture (Lux Ver.). There’s also a guest appearance by Scarlett Johansson with a special message for Hatsune Miku. With twintails as grand as Hatsune Miku’s, it would take some …

The post Lux Commercial Featuring Hatsune Miku & Scarlett Johansson Now Online appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The full commercial from Lux’s previous teaser announcement is now online! In this video, we finally get to hear the entirety of Mitchie M‘s song, Future Overture (Lux Ver.). There’s also a guest appearance by Scarlett Johansson with a special message for Hatsune Miku.

With twintails as grand as Hatsune Miku’s, it would take some pretty serious hair care products to keep it all polished and straight, but Lux feels confident their products are up to the challenge. Check out the official video below!

Lyrics:

（さあ今）まっすぐに生きる
（ハートで）ほら、歩き出せば
（ここから）憧れが現実に変わるステージ
（まばゆい）ライトに包まれて
（始まる）私の物語
（行こうよ）輝いた髪なびかせ（Hooray！）

 

The post Lux Commercial Featuring Hatsune Miku & Scarlett Johansson Now Online appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID News Network is Now Available in French!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
For those of you who have been following us for a while, you may be well aware that VNN French had been planned for some time now. (We have made several references to it in the past.) Now, we are proud to announce that the time has come to finally add French to our list …

The post VOCALOID News Network is Now Available in French! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
For those of you who have been following us for a while, you may be well aware that VNN French had been planned for some time now. (We have made several references to it in the past.)

Now, we are proud to announce that the time has come to finally add French to our list of languages on VNN. We hope that the French VOCALOID community will be happy with this newest addition. As always, our goal is to have a reliable source for all things VOCALOID in one place, as well as to be able to reach as many people possible globally. We hope to add more languages to VNN in the near future!

You can also find our French Facebook page below where we will be posting all of our French VNN articles, images, songs, and much more!

Thank you everyone for your great support along the way!

Link to VNN French here.

The post VOCALOID News Network is Now Available in French! appeared first on VNN.
